LanguageData.Ratkin_WildChild.title: Ratkin Wild Born
LanguageData.Ratkin_WildChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the wilds away from the safety of civilization. The wilderness toughened [PAWN_objective], but [PAWN_pronoun] did not receive a formal education.
LanguageData.Ratkin_LandRat.title: Ratkin Land Rat
LanguageData.Ratkin_LandRat.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in darkness. After years of cave life, [PAWN_pronoun] could swing a pick as well as [PAWN_pronoun] could walk. When many of [PAWN_possessive] compatriots went deeper into the earth, [PAWN_nameDef] left them behind and made [PAWN_possessive] way to the surface instead.
LanguageData.Ratkin_CountryKid.title: Ratkin Country Kid
LanguageData.Ratkin_CountryKid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s grandparents were farmers and [PAWN_possessive] parents were farmers after them. [PAWN_nameDef] will become a farmer too in time, and so the tradition will continue.
LanguageData.Ratkin_ShepherdBoy.title: Ratkin Shepherd Boy
LanguageData.Ratkin_ShepherdBoy.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up living with [PAWN_possessive] family's herd. [PAWN_pronoun] regards animals as close friends.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Orphan.title: Ratkin Orphan
LanguageData.Ratkin_Orphan.baseDescription: Abandoned, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up without parents. [PAWN_pronoun] had to depend on [PAWN_possessive] wits to survive, so although [PAWN_pronoun] didn't receive a formal education, [PAWN_pronoun] did pick up some tricks along the way.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Student.title: Ratkin Student
LanguageData.Ratkin_Student.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s family wasn't wealthy, but they could afford to send [PAWN_objective] for schooling. [PAWN_pronoun] found [PAWN_pronoun] had much more of a talent for studying than athletics.
LanguageData.Ratkin_LittleLibrarian.title: Ratkin Little Librarian
LanguageData.Ratkin_LittleLibrarian.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a pile of [PAWN_possessive] parent's books. [PAWN_pronoun] knows much of obscure subjects, but suffers from poor eyesight brought on by hours upon hours of candlelit reading.
LanguageData.Ratkin_GoldenSpoon.title: Ratkin Rich Kid
LanguageData.Ratkin_GoldenSpoon.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a wealthy household. [PAWN_pronoun] wanted for little growing up surrounded by expensive works of art, but as a consequence learned little as well.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Bastard.title: Ratkin Bastard
LanguageData.Ratkin_Bastard.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born the child of a concubine. [PAWN_pronoun] was discovered plotting to seize inheritance and was forced to flee.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Successor.title: Ratkin Heir
LanguageData.Ratkin_Successor.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born the heir of a noble family. When the once-famous family fell upon misfortune, [PAWN_pronoun] had to set off to make [PAWN_possessive] own way in the world.
LanguageData.Ratkin_GuardenerStudent.title: Ratkin Guardener Squire
LanguageData.Ratkin_GuardenerStudent.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] began training at an early age in the hopes of becoming a Guardener, Ratkin society's elite defenders and caretakers of the garden.
LanguageData.Ratkin_ChefStudent.title: Ratkin Apprentice Chef
LanguageData.Ratkin_ChefStudent.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] learned to cook at an early age due to [PAWN_possessive] passion for delicious food. For [PAWN_objective], exquisite food is the spice of life, so [PAWN_pronoun] set off on an adventure to discover new flavors to add to [PAWN_possessive] repertoire.
LanguageData.Ratkin_RomanyKid.title: Ratkin Nomad Child
LanguageData.Ratkin_RomanyKid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled far and wide as a child. [PAWN_pronoun] picked up many skills in [PAWN_possessive] travels, but [PAWN_pronoun] missed out on forming deep connections with other Ratkin.
LanguageData.Ratkin_OfficerChild.title: Ratkin Officer Child
LanguageData.Ratkin_OfficerChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born the child of commissioned officers. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to shoot and lead at an early age and became a prime candidate in the academy, but unfortunately [PAWN_pronoun] inherited [PAWN_possessive] parents' haughty demeanor as well.
LanguageData.Ratkin_MerchantKid.title: Ratkin Merchant Kid
LanguageData.Ratkin_MerchantKid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were merchants and [PAWN_pronoun] grew up watching over their shoulders as they bartered and bargained.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Kid.title: Ratkin Kid
LanguageData.Ratkin_Kid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is just an ordinary kid. [PAWN_possessive] parents couldn't afford to send [PAWN_objective] for schooling, but [PAWN_pronoun] picked up a variety of skills watching [PAWN_possessive] parents at work.
LanguageData.Ratkin_ServentChild.title: Ratkin Servant Child
LanguageData.Ratkin_ServentChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born the child of servants. By law, [PAWN_pronoun] would become a servant as well. Seeking to escape [PAWN_possessive] fate [PAWN_pronoun] fled to find a new life elsewhere.
LanguageData.Ratkin_HumanAssistant.title: Ratkin Human Assistant
LanguageData.Ratkin_HumanAssistant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up as the assistant to a human, but when [PAWN_possessive] owner died in an unfortunate accident, [PAWN_pronoun] hit the road to find [PAWN_possessive] own life somewhere new.
LanguageData.Ratkin_CityKid.title: Ratkin City Kid
LanguageData.Ratkin_CityKid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in the city. Growing up amidst urban surrounds [PAWN_pronoun] came to understand human civilization well, in contrast to [PAWN_possessive] more rural Ratkin relatives.
LanguageData.Ratkin_SlaveKid.title: Ratkin Slave Kid
LanguageData.Ratkin_SlaveKid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has no memory of how [PAWN_pronoun] got here, but a slave-mark shows where [PAWN_pronoun] came from. [PAWN_pronoun] remembers running for freedom to escape the endless drudgery.
LanguageData.Ratkin_LaboratoryRats.title: Ratkin Lab Rat
LanguageData.Ratkin_LaboratoryRats.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a laboratory - a genetically engineered military rat created for war. [PAWN_pronoun] longed for freedom and one day managed to slip [PAWN_possessive] bonds, kill the scientists, and escape.
LanguageData.Ratkin_PettyTheft.title: Ratkin Petty Thief
LanguageData.Ratkin_PettyTheft.baseDescription: For [PAWN_nameDef], stealing was just borrowing something for a bit. [PAWN_possessive] frequent theft eventually caught up with [PAWN_objective] and [PAWN_pronoun] was forced into slavery. Luckily the slavers were attacked and [PAWN_pronoun] was able to escape in the confusion.
LanguageData.Ratkin_CaravanMerchant.title: Ratkin Caravan Merchant
LanguageData.Ratkin_CaravanMerchant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a successful merchant living life on the road. But after bandits attacked [PAWN_possessive] caravan and took everything, [PAWN_pronoun] decided to pursue a different career.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Wanderer.title: Ratkin Drifter
LanguageData.Ratkin_Wanderer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is just a drifter floating from place to place. For [PAWN_objective], life within a Garden's walls is no more than a dream.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Farmer.title: Ratkin Farmer
LanguageData.Ratkin_Farmer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a farmer. [PAWN_pronoun] became a farmer by taking over the family farm and someday [PAWN_possessive] kids will inherit the farm in turn.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Miner.title: Ratkin Miner
LanguageData.Ratkin_Miner.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s strong arms make [PAWN_objective] a natural at mining. While digging comes easily to [PAWN_objective], [PAWN_pronoun] daydreams of abandoning the narrow and stuffy mine shafts where [PAWN_pronoun] works.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Hunter.title: Ratkin Hunter
LanguageData.Ratkin_Hunter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] hunts beasts. Unlike other Ratkin, [PAWN_pronoun] has excellent eyesight so [PAWN_pronoun] can observe [PAWN_possessive] prey from a distance.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Shepherd.title: Ratkin Shepherd
LanguageData.Ratkin_Shepherd.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a ranch. [PAWN_pronoun] used to have many animals in [PAWN_possessive] herd, but a toxic ship crash put an end to that.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Civil.title: Ratkin Citizen
LanguageData.Ratkin_Civil.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the common citizens of the Ratkin kingdom. [PAWN_pronoun] has made a living working various menial jobs within the country.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Noble.title: Ratkin Noble
LanguageData.Ratkin_Noble.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a noble of the Ratkin kingdom who was forced into exile due to political machinations. [PAWN_pronoun] is on a journey to return to [PAWN_possessive] rightful place.
LanguageData.Ratkin_CityMerchant.title: Ratkin City Merchant
LanguageData.Ratkin_CityMerchant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a merchant in the bustling city. Many goods have crossed through [PAWN_possessive] quick hands, and more coins besides.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Librarian.title: Ratkin Librarian
LanguageData.Ratkin_Librarian.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a keeper of the library. [PAWN_pronoun] has a lot of academic knowledge, but has forgotten how to get [PAWN_possessive] hands dirty.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Guardener.title: Ratkin Guardener
LanguageData.Ratkin_Guardener.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the cream of the crop of Ratkin Guardeners. But during [PAWN_possessive] last mission [PAWN_pronoun] was separated from the group and lost [PAWN_possessive] way. [PAWN_pronoun] seeks a way back to [PAWN_possessive] kingdom.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Knight.title: Ratkin Knight
LanguageData.Ratkin_Knight.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is knight of Ratkinia, the bulwarks of the kingdom and pillars of society.
LanguageData.Ratkin_KnightCommander.title: Ratkin Knight Commander
LanguageData.Ratkin_KnightCommander.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a leader of the knights of Ratkinia. In accordance with tradition, the commander is chosen from the knights of the countryside.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Teacher.title: Ratkin Teacher
LanguageData.Ratkin_Teacher.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a schoolteacher from a remote rural village. When the last of the kids in [PAWN_possessive] hometown left, [PAWN_pronoun] had no choice but to start again somewhere new.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Blacksmith.title: Ratkin Blacksmith
LanguageData.Ratkin_Blacksmith.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a blacksmith who prides [PAWN_objective]self on the craftsmanship of [PAWN_possessive] weapons and tools. [PAWN_pronoun] went on an adventure to search for improved materials to strengthen [PAWN_possessive] work.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Thief.title: Ratkin Thief
LanguageData.Ratkin_Thief.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lives a life of crime, stealing constantly to get by. [PAWN_pronoun] moves from city to city each time [PAWN_possessive] face becomes known to authorities.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Ambassador.title: Ratkin Ambassador
LanguageData.Ratkin_Ambassador.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a diplomat of Ratkinia. [PAWN_pronoun] is temporarily exiled and lying low after a political incident.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Soldier.title: Ratkin Soldier
LanguageData.Ratkin_Soldier.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a soldier working in a human city. [PAWN_pronoun] has trained among the humans and mastered combat arts unknown in Ratkin lands. Unfortunately when the last mission went awry [PAWN_pronoun] was abandoned by [PAWN_possessive] comrades, and so [PAWN_pronoun] has decided to seek out a new life elsewhere.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Explorer.title: Ratkin Explorer
LanguageData.Ratkin_Explorer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is full of curiosity about the world. [PAWN_pronoun] won't stop until [PAWN_pronoun] has mapped every last corner of this planet and discovered all its secrets.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Chef.title: Ratkin Chef
LanguageData.Ratkin_Chef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a chef who loves to create new dishes. [PAWN_pronoun] has set out to find the finest and most exotic ingredients.
LanguageData.Ratkin_HandMaiden.title: Ratkin Handmaiden
LanguageData.Ratkin_HandMaiden.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is maidservant of the nobility, tasked with both common chores as well as being [PAWN_possessive] masters' eyes and ears.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Shooter.title: Ratkin Marksman
LanguageData.Ratkin_Shooter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has excellent eyesight for a Ratkin. [PAWN_pronoun] volunteered for military service, and thanks to [PAWN_possessive] ability has become the top marksman in [PAWN_possessive] unit.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Doctor.title: Ratkin Doctor
LanguageData.Ratkin_Doctor.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a doctor in one of the main cities of Ratkinia, but was exiled to the provinces after [PAWN_pronoun] failed to save the life of a nobleman in [PAWN_possessive] care. [PAWN_pronoun] has since traveled from place to place sharpening [PAWN_possessive] medical skills to redeem [PAWN_objective]self.
LanguageData.Ratkin_ArmySurgeon.title: Ratkin Medic
LanguageData.Ratkin_ArmySurgeon.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] saved the lives of many Ratkin on the battlefield. Though [PAWN_pronoun] may be small, [PAWN_pronoun] bravely volunteered out of a sense of kinship and duty, but eventually [PAWN_pronoun] wound up leaving after becoming disillusioned and realizing that nothing would change.
LanguageData.Ratkin_ConstructionWorker.title: Ratkin Construction Worker
LanguageData.Ratkin_ConstructionWorker.baseDescriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] is a laborer working on construction sites. [PAWN_pronoun] has worked on many of the area's underground tunnels.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Rich.title: Ratkin Swindler
LanguageData.Ratkin_Rich.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has a natural gift for cheating people out of money. But a bit of bad luck saw [PAWN_objective] caught in one of [PAWN_possessive] schemes and [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to flee to the countryside to escape justice.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Sister.title: Ratkin Sister
LanguageData.Ratkin_Sister.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a nun, keeper of ancestral rites and caretaker of religious affairs in Ratkin society. [PAWN_pronoun] was attacked while on pilgrimage and was barely able to escape with [PAWN_possessive] life.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Butcher.title: Ratkin Butcher
LanguageData.Ratkin_Butcher.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] butchers animals and sells their meat.
LanguageData.Ratkin_CityMaid.title: Ratkin City Maid
LanguageData.Ratkin_CityMaid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a housekeeper in the big city. Humans like to hire particularly adorable Ratkin as maids and [PAWN_pronoun] was one of them.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Idol.title: Ratkin Idol
LanguageData.Ratkin_Idol.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a popular entertainment idol. Unfortunately, [PAWN_possessive] car overturned while on tour and when [PAWN_pronoun] opened [PAWN_possessive] eyes [PAWN_pronoun] found [PAWN_objective]self in unfamiliar surroundings.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Murderer.title: Ratkin Murderer
LanguageData.Ratkin_Murderer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] went mad living in the big city and began to murder for fun. [PAWN_pronoun] took advantage of [PAWN_possessive] small body to quickly escape from the scene of the crime by ways too narrow for humans to follow.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Assistant.title: Ratkin Assistant
LanguageData.Ratkin_Assistant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] assisted humans in research projects both large and small. [PAWN_pronoun] learned much watching over their shoulders at every opportunity.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Scientist.title: Ratkin Scientist
LanguageData.Ratkin_Scientist.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has long worked as a scientist among humans. Too much time spent absorbed in study has taken a toll on [PAWN_possessive] body and eyesight.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Engineer.title: Ratkin Engineer
LanguageData.Ratkin_Engineer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an engineer who used to machine precision parts. As a personal project, [PAWN_pronoun] used [PAWN_possessive] considerable talents to create a functional mechanoid. [PAWN_pronoun] still doesn't get why everyone made such a fuss about it.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Agriculturist.title: Ratkin Agriculturist
LanguageData.Ratkin_Agriculturist.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an agronomist who came to the city to advance the agricultural science of Ratkinia. [PAWN_pronoun] dreams of going back to [PAWN_possessive] hometown one day, and bringing with [PAWN_objective] priceless knowledge.
LanguageData.Ratkin_RatkinHunter.title: Ratkin Manhunter
LanguageData.Ratkin_RatkinHunter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] used to track and capture escaped Ratkin. One day when [PAWN_pronoun] caught sight of [PAWN_possessive] young quarry, [PAWN_pronoun] became filled with doubt about the job and left to walk a different path.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Subject.title: Ratkin Test Subject
LanguageData.Ratkin_Subject.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Ratkin test subject. Many awful experiments have toughened [PAWN_possessive] body. It seemed [PAWN_pronoun] would be trapped there forever, but a lab accident gave [PAWN_objective] an opening and [PAWN_pronoun] barely managed to escape.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Vagabond.title: Ratkin Vagabond
LanguageData.Ratkin_Vagabond.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has spent [PAWN_possessive] life wandering. [PAWN_possessive] past is a mystery, but the wisdom gained from it seems reliable enough.
LanguageData.Ratkin_Demoman.title: Ratkin Demolitionist
LanguageData.Ratkin_Demoman.baseDescription: Unlike other Ratkin, [PAWN_nameDef] is obsessed with explosions. Ratkin commandos put [PAWN_possessive] talents to good use.
